mapper.select: select * from LODGE where LODID in (select LODID from (select rownum as rnum, LODID from (select LODID from LODGE WHERE LODCATE='펜션' order by LODID desc)) where rnum>=1 and rnum<=8) order by LODID desc
select count(*) cnt from LODGE WHERE LODCATE='호텔'

select * from LODGE where LODID in (select LODID from (select rownum as rnum, LODID from (select LODID from LODGE WHERE LODCATE='호텔' order by LODID desc)) where rnum>=#{row1} and rnum<=#{row2}) order by LODID desc
